name: Euchre
description:
Enjoy Euchre on your iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad!

Euchre is fun card game played by four people. In this version of Euchre, a deck of 24 cards is used. You play with a computer partner against two computer opponents. You will not be disappointed by the computer players - they know what they are doing.

Play against computer opponents who are beginners, intermediates, or experts. The score to win defaults to 10 points but it can be changed in the game options.

This is a great game to play when you only have a few minute or you can even play for a few hours… The cards are good looking, are easy to read, and are easy to move around. This game is a pleasure to play!

Features:
- Beginner, intermediate, and expert opponents
- The score to win a game is configurable
- Players can play alone
- Game statistics
- Awards

Future versions of this game will include the most requested features and game variations.
